mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users u, user_info i, departments d WHERE u.emp_no = i.emp_no AND i.dept_no = d.dept_no
SELECT u.id,u.emp_no,i.name,i.rank,d.dept_name FROM users u, user_info i, departments d WHERE i.dept_no = d.dept_no AND u.emp_no = i.emp_no AND u.emp_no = (SELECT emp_no FROM users WHERE id = #{id})
